Title: Japan’s LNG stocks fall to their lowest level this year amid high temperatures
Description: LNG stocks held by Japan’s power utilities fell to their lowest level for the year as high temperatures across the country likely boosted consumption of LNG for cooling and power generation purposes.
Author: CK

Title: Production halt at ADNOC’s Das Island LNG plant sparks spot supply concerns
Description: The ADNOC-operated 5.8 mtpa Das Island LNG export facility in Abu Dhabi has not shipped a cargo in the last two weeks, raising concerns that an extended outage could tighten supplies if Asian demand picks up further.
Author: CK
